text: Tertenia (Tertenìa) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Nuoro in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 3,936 people lived there. Its area is 117.65 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 129 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Nuoro
title: Tertenia
